_header: Lo leman sweet now may thou see
_description: Appeal of Christ to Man, his ‘Lemman’ — two 6-line stanzas (aabccb)

CULDd564.First Lines:
Lo lemman swete now may þou seþat I haue lost my lyf for
                    þe…
CULDd564.Last Lines:
…Þat I þi lufe sa dere have boghtAnd I aske þe
                    noght elles
